#summary Documentation for the CSHandle class

= Introduction =

CSHandle implements the generalized stream interface used by the new API in XADMaster.framework.

Unfortunately, this documentation has not been written yet, so the only information available is in the [http://code.google.com/p/theunarchiver/source/browse/trunk/XADMaster/CSHandle.h CSHandle.h header file], and the [http://code.google.com/p/theunarchiver/source/browse/trunk/XADMaster/XADTest2.m XADTest2.m] and [http://code.google.com/p/theunarchiver/source/browse/trunk/XADMaster/XADTest3.m XADTest3.m] example programs.
